post.body: @schmeenarf I'm getting some Skullcandy over the ears, big and baller. Excited cuz my current ones are 1/2 broken.
Got the DVD! Joy! Best xmas gift ever. Anyways just some other candies and such but the DVD makes it all worth it.
Happy Birthday! = 2x gifts. Gotta celebrate again back at Penn. @MyThermopylae I made my Troll Rogue 4 real: Calthian, friend me.
I'm salivating: http://tinyurl.com/6nfgm9
New Years joy! Semi-slept but it was a rly good time. Lots of drinking and no cops so mission accomplished. Welcome 2009!
Quick headphone update: OMFG!!! These things are blowing my mind, literally. Can I coin the term "Eargasm"? Cause that bout sums it up.
Yay new SkullCandy headphones! A late holiday gift but definitely needed. I've gone through 2 many headphones recently. Dough!
DC is nice. I can sleep soundly. With all hope Blanca will be here sometime today. New Years celebrations here we come! I wanna be smashed!
I'm back in DC! Finally! SC was nice and warm with clear skies but I'm glad to be home. Long long drive. Many movies to see yet.
Staring up at the beautiful SC night sky. I wish i ccould see stars this clearly more often. Its times like this i remember astro & wond ...
Yay interenets! At uncle and aunts other house to stay a night on the way to SC. Mom and I walked up to wrong house at first...oops!
Got back home from family xmas stuff, now I gotta leave again for more family stuff. Driving to SC...god damn I sometimes hate holidays.
Well I guess the WoW experiment is over. The trials pretty much up and 5 characters and untold hours later I don't know how I feel bout it..
Back from holiday party. Last day of WoW trial, o nos! Guess its a good thing. Anywho gotta turn my comp in for fixes tomorrow so no tweets.
More xmas stuff going. Very full on turkey now. cant wait for new headphones and dessert.
Delicious Christmas Eve meal at aunts. Can't wait for tomorrow even though I expect few to no gifts: see my family.
Sitting in car bout to go to aunt & uncles for christmas. pretty excited to see cousins new baby. cant believe i get internet in the car.
dammit bout to play WoW with @MyThermoylae but servers full after accidently making warrior instead of rogue. Stupid.
Just woke up after hibernating for 15 hrs tying my all time record. Strange dreams I can't rly remember. Hope I got 2 sleep earlier 2nite.
well finally gonna get some sleep. Gotta start looking into odd jobs for some spending money. Plus holiday stuff is looming TOO FAST!
